dotnetType.name: UInt16ResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Char" /> and <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Char" />
            or <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result
            otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves ushort (16-bit unsigned integer) type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UInt16ResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
